page.title: 07Employment in Penryn
page.content: There are many forms of employment to be found in and around the town of {Penryn.}Many people found employment in the shops, offices and garages of the town itself. { }The{"Penryn Project"} has provided much employment in the building trade.A survey showed that approximately{300}houses needed restoration.The project started{6th {February 1976,}and is still continuing today with well over{200}properties already being restored. { Carrick District {Planning Authority}in close co-operation with{Penryn}Town Council have succeeded in providing space and the facilities for a number of new firms over the last decades.This has provided the town with many new jobs. { {
